casebody.data:
C.C., Individually and By and Through His parents and Next Friends, Charles Cripps, et ux., et al., petitioners,
v.
HURST-EULESS BEDFORD INDEPENDENT SCHOOL DISTRICT. No. 16-138. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 11, 2016.

*298Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.
